articles.title: DBS to buy Citi's consumer banking business in Taiwan - CNA
articles.description:
SINGAPORE: DBS Group, Southeast Asia's largest bank, has agreed to buy Citigroup's consumer banking business in Taiwan via a transfer of assets and liabilities and will take over the 3,500 staff employed in the retail arm.

It will pay cash for the net asse…

articles.title: Days after China, PM Modi holds summit with five Central Asian countries - The Indian Express
articles.description: China held a summit with the leaders of Central Asian countries on January 25, at a very short notice, after India had announced its summit.
